body_html:
From your description, it sounds like they're not being linked in, so you should look at what the command line that links all the .o files in the makefile logs looks like, and ensure it has the ones generated from the .cc's you want.

As a note, this sort of manual compilation will be a bit fragile, since you'll have to do the same steps #1 and #2 whenever ops are added or changed.

body:
From your description, it sounds like they're not being linked in, so you should look at what the command line that links all the .o files in the makefile logs looks like, and ensure it has the ones generated from the .cc's you want.

As a note, this sort of manual compilation will be a bit fragile, since you'll have to do the same steps #1 and #2 whenever ops are added or changed.
